item.title: YouTube TV, Fox Corp. Reach Short-Term Deal Extension, Averting Blackout of Fox News, Other Channels for Now
item.description: Fox News, local TV stations and other Fox Corp.-owned networks will remain on YouTube TV — for now — after the parties agreed to a short-term extension to their previous contract, as talks

item.title: YouTube TV, Fox Corp. Reach Short-Term Deal Extension, Averting Blackout of Fox News, Other Channels for Now
item.description: Fox News, local TV stations and other Fox Corp.-owned networks will remain on YouTube TV — for now — after the parties agreed to a short-term extension to their previous contract, as talks

item.title: YouTube TV May Drop Fox News, Fox Local TV and More Channels in Contract Dispute
item.description: YouTube TV’s millions of subscribers could lose Fox News, FS1, local Fox TV stations and more as soon as this Wednesday if the Google-owned video service can’t reach a deal with Fox Corp.

item.title: YouTube TV May Drop Fox News, Fox Local TV and More Channels in Contract Dispute
item.description: YouTube TV’s millions of subscribers could lose Fox News, FS1, local Fox TV stations and more as soon as this Wednesday if the Google-owned video service can’t reach a deal with Fox Corp.

item.title: Fox Buys Major Stake in Penske Entertainment, Extending Indycar Rights Deal
item.description: The media company will acquire one third of the company, which owns Indycar and the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, while extending its media rights deal.
